questions: Can you provide an overview of your experience in the Software Development industry over the past 5.4 years?
How did you stay up-to-date with industry trends and technologies during your employment gap of 1.5 years?
Can you elaborate on the personal reasons that led to your employment gap and how they have shaped your professional growth?
What specific skills or achievements from your previous roles do you believe set you apart as a standout candidate in the Software Development field?
How do you approach problem-solving and decision-making in a fast-paced and dynamic industry like Software Development?
Can you discuss a challenging project you worked on and how you successfully navigated any obstacles or setbacks?
How do you prioritize and manage your workload to ensure timely delivery of projects and tasks?
In what ways have you collaborated with cross-functional teams or stakeholders in your previous roles, and what were the outcomes of these collaborations?
How do you approach learning new technologies or tools to enhance your skill set and stay competitive in the industry?
Can you provide an example of a situation where you had to adapt to a change in project requirements or scope, and how you effectively managed the transition?
